title: style baked seabass with bok choi and a rice noodle salad
description: A simple yet impressive dish for your guests to discover at the table as they unwrap this parcel of sea bass infused with Thai flavours. The secret is all in the prep and the oven takes care of the rest.
ingredients: 5cm/2in fresh ginger, peeled and very finely chopped
1 large sea bass, gutted and cleaned
1 red chilli, seeds removed, thinly sliced
½ cucumber, peeled lengthways into ribbons
6 spring onions, trimmed and finely chopped
1 red chilli, seeds removed, thinly sliced
